 return true;
})()
;if(applies){(function execute() {(function execute() {
 /* Populate change password processes for logged in user
 */ 
 var options = [];
 var passwordResetScopedUtilObj = new global.PasswordResetScopedUtil();
 var processIds = passwordResetScopedUtilObj.getChangePasswordProcessIds(gs.getUserID());
 for (var i = 0; i < processIds.length; i++) {
 var processId = processIds[i];
 var process = getProcessDetails(processId);
 if (process != undefined) {
 options.push(process);
 }
 }
 vaVars.pwd_change_processes = JSON.stringify(options);

 function getProcessDetails(processId) {
 var gr = new GlideRecord('pwd_process');
 gr.get(processId)
 processDetails = {
 'value': gr.getUniqueValue(),
 'label': gr.getDisplayValue('label') == "" || gr.getDisplayValue('label') == null
 ? gr.getValue('name') : gr.getDisplayValue('label')
 }
 return processDetails;
 }
})()
;})();}else{vaInputs.__silent_ScriptedAction_6cb41e9a12f24d5bb0a950f0a66a93c7="";}vaInputs.__silent_ScriptedAction_6cb41e9a12f24d5bb0a950f0a66a93c7=true;null;","confirm_msg_on_default_value":{"msg":"","val_for_confirm":true},"nlu_text_input":false,"nlu_confirmation_prompt":false,"acknowledge_msg":"vaVars.previous_graph_node="Populate Change Password Process___6cb41e9a12f24d5bb0a950f0a66a93c7";var ackMsg=null;var applies=(function execute() {
